parameters.description: Authentication token. Provide either this header or the access_token query parameter. The server accepts an optional leading 'TOKEN ' prefix which will be stripped.

parameters.description: Authentication token as a query parameter. Provide either this or the Authorization header.

parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Bearer token for authentication. The server accepts an Authorization header with the form "TOKEN <token>"; one of Authorization header or access_token query parameter must be provided.

parameters.description: Alternative access token provided as a query parameter. One of Authorization header or access_token query parameter must be provided.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Username of the profile to follow
